files.content:
import { SearchIcon } from "lucide-react"

import {
  InputGroup,
  InputGroupAddon,
  InputGroupInput,
} from "@/registry/default/ui/input-group"

export default function InputGroupSm() {
  return (
    <InputGroup>
      <InputGroupInput
        size="sm"
        type="search"
        placeholder="Search"
        aria-label="Search"
      />
      <InputGroupAddon>
        <SearchIcon />
      </InputGroupAddon>
    </InputGroup>
  )
}
